description: Must be used as the last child of ListItem to function properly.

children.description: The content of the component, normally an `IconButton` or selection control.

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

name: ListItemSecondaryAction

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.disableGutters: Styles applied to the root element when the parent `ListItem` has `disableGutters={true}`.
